attributes.action: intervene and depose the barbaric regime of Saudi Arabia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: since the troops are in the area, and you seem to want to make peace (or war?) in the middle east, lets get rid of the house of Saud.  A regime which bully's women, has public beheadings which make Saddams hanging look humane, and is generally run by greedy oil barons with little concern for the many poor people of their country.  If Saddam's regime was worth taking down then so are the Saudi's.
